ncrsdatagroup.abcd:ProjectTitle: Collecting trip to the Azores in 1979

ncrsGatheringSites.abcd:LocalityText: AZO.029: AZO.29: Azores, Faial, S coast, Horta, W-side of Porto Pim; 38°31'N 28°38'W; sandy bottom with rocks, stones and boulders; shore-collecting; 8.x.1979
CANCAP-II, Sta. 2.096: Canary Islands, S of Hierro, off Punta de la Restinga; 27°37'N 17°59'W; depth 260 m; van Veen grab; 3.ix.1977
CANCAP-V, Sta. 5.009: Azores, S of Sao Miguel; 37°41'N 25°30,W; depth 110 m, muddy calcareous sand with shells; van Veen grab; 26.v.1981
